Please note that PLOS ONE has specific guidelines on software sharing ( http://journals.plos.org/plosone/s/materials-and-software-sharing#loc-sharing-software) for manuscripts whose main purpose is the description of a new software or software package. In this case, new software must conform to the Open Source Definition ( https://opensource.org/docs/osd) and be deposited in an open software archive. Please see http://journals.plos.org/plosone/s/materials-and-software-sharing#loc-depositing-software for more information on depositing your software.
